markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Cursed Family](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=70)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Eye of Dread

</column>

Rumors abound that your family is cursed. While that would explain several unfortunate events in your family history, you may or may not believe it. Regardless, odd coincidences plague your lineage, and perhaps even appear in your own life, and you have become used to spotting strangeness around you.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) skill, and the [Curse Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Oddity Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=817) skill feat.
name: Cursed Family

text: Cursed Family Source World Guide pg. 46 2.0 Region Eye of Dread Rumors abound that your family is cursed. While that would explain several unfortunate events in your family history, you may or may not believe it. Regardless, odd coincidences plague your lineage, and perhaps even appear in your own life, and you have become used to spotting strangeness around you. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Occultism skill, and the Curse Lore skill. You gain the Oddity Identification skill feat.
